name: angular-bootstrap
description: A template to kick-start an AngularJS 1 app using GovRight Corpus backend

scripts.start: echo 'Installing setup dependencies, please wait...' && npm install > /dev/null && echo && node ./setup.js && cp ./sample/npm-shrinkwrap.json ./npm-shrinkwrap.json && rm -rf ./node_modules ./sample ./setup.js && npm install && bower install && echo && echo 'All done, happy coding!'

author: GovRight <contact@govright.org>
